task.title: Cleaning Up
task.shortdesc: As much as you don't want to, you'll have to clean up the kitchen.

taskbody.context:
I will provide you with an easy guide for cleaning up after your breakfast.
Steps for cleaning up the kitchen

step.cmd: Store any leftover food in airtight containers. Place these containers in the fridge or give them to your guests to take home.
Once all the food is put away, put all of the dirty dishes in the dishwasher or hand wash them
Wipe off the counters and the kitchen table
Make sure no food has fallen on the floor, vacuum if needed!
Say farwell to your breakfast guests!
Now relax and sleep off your food coma!
